data.text: @JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon He was fined multiple times for not renting to black and Hispanics. And he still thinks the Central Park 5 are guilty. He met with Kim K for prison reform but hasnt signed a bill that would change the 3 strike rule and other prison reform. The R means nothing
@wilhova @JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon "Smarty"?! Not lookin' to argue, eh?! I think this is where I exit the conversation. Hold it down without me. 😂
@wilhova @JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon And who registered him as a racist in 2012?! It's well-documented that he's been called that since the late-1970s. Bruh, stop talking.
@wilhova @JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon In all sincerity, you're not making any sense. He wasn't a registered dem until early-2000s. Get the 1990s off your mind.
@Romello185 @wilhova @CurtisScoon I'm not disagreeing there.
@JohnnyBishop @wilhova @CurtisScoon And let's also stop pretending he's solely despised for racism. He's a poor leader and has no clue how to govern.
@JohnnyBishop @wilhova @CurtisScoon Until he began saying some overtly racist remarks. Once again, I use the word exposure. Things that weren't known prior, are known now.

@wilhova @Romello185 @CurtisScoon So literally all over the map depending on what he needs and what politicians could help. NY loved him. His shows were #1. He made some missteps but he wasnt hated or seen as an overt racist until ....
@wilhova @JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon You literally repeated what I posted. Trump adopted democratic ideals in the early-2000s. Don't argue. Read!
@wilhova @JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon His party affiliation w/Republicans didn't prevent that from happening.
@wilhova @JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon Wrong! He didn't adopt democratic ideals until early-2000s. The point is still void. He was a (R) for 15 years and was celebrated.
@JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon My guy. Trump registered as a Republican in Manhattan in 1987. 😒

@Romello185 @CurtisScoon Its 100% party affiliation. He was always exposed but no one cared because he was a NY Democrat mostly plus rich. Everyone knew he cheated, lied, etc. But who cares as long as he was on "our side"
@JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon Once new and critical information about said person is made true and available. My guy! This is actually the purest form of media.
@JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon Things the public were once unaware of became public knowledge. You're not obligated nor is it sensible to continue "like" someone
@JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon The microscope of runningfor political office. Same thing happened to John Edwards (a Democratic candidate).
@JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon I think it has less to do w/party affiliation and more to do with exposure. The skeletons in his closet came to the surface under
@Romello185 @CurtisScoon My biggest thing is, Trump was admired by Hollywood, rich and politician alike UNTIL he ran as a Republican and all of a sudden he's everything evil under the sun.
@HoodThougts666 @JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon https://t.co/XN53jpym7b
@RunningPaladin2 @DonnellKearney @CurtisScoon We’re done Rob ✌️

@RunningPaladin2 @DonnellKearney @CurtisScoon You can’t even break down a horrible article. That YOU sent me. You can be on either side you want. But you’re lack of diligence showed me everything I needed to know. Once you get defeated you will start going to race attacks I know “your type”
@RunningPaladin2 @DonnellKearney @CurtisScoon Your whole life is talking bad about Democrats. Something you don’t control. They do control your weak mind though. You’re obsessed get help!!
@RunningPaladin2 @DonnellKearney @CurtisScoon 😂 I  defeated your ass so bad you started talking about random shit
@RunningPaladin2 @DonnellKearney @CurtisScoon “Bashar al-Assad=benevolent leader. John Kerry= dunce. Vladimir Putin=greatest leader in the history of statecraft.”

@RunningPaladin2 @DonnellKearney @CurtisScoon A local news station said this about your “blog” “We were surprised, for example, to find the website Zero Hedge listed as “bipartisan”. A former Zero Hedge writer, Colin Lokey, told Bloomberg that the site’s political stance was: “Russia=good. Obama=idiot”
@RunningPaladin2 @DonnellKearney @CurtisScoon I just debunked your shit. FYI I owned business way before trump. I don’t need a Daddy to tell me what to do or how to think.

@RunningPaladin2 @DonnellKearney @CurtisScoon The site that this “blog” sites. Only breaks down the demographic of these 2000 black wonders they surveyed. It didn’t even mention an increase or descrese. 🤦‍♂️

@RunningPaladin2 @DonnellKearney @CurtisScoon Dude did you actually read this bullshit article? This article is based on a survey of 2000 business owners. And all the racist comments from your “blog” gave it away. Even most comments call out the horrible citing of this article. This site is pro-Trump only.
@CurtisScoon https://t.co/ikHVUwlUC9

@CurtisScoon I find it funny that black people love Alec Baldwin when he called a black phtographer a "coon", "crackhead" and " drug dealer". Either black people are the most forgiven or the most forgettable.
@RunningPaladin2 @DonnellKearney @CurtisScoon Show proof or shut the fuck up
@RunningPaladin2 @DonnellKearney @CurtisScoon Get out of Trumps ass (personally I nothing against the man) but what you said makes zero sense. C’mon man. Do better
@RunningPaladin2 @DonnellKearney @CurtisScoon 😂😂😂 wow
@RunningPaladin2 @DonnellKearney @CurtisScoon What is this number based on? Ownership of what? So in 2 years blacks become business owners 4x than before?
@JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon The NAACP has not awarded any medals to Trump. Nor have any other civil rights groups.
@JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon Most of them white.
@JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon William Fugazy was politically well-connected businessman who pleaded guilty to perjury, gave the awards to Trump and 79 other people.
@JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon The medal he was given was actually taken at an awards ceremony organized by a business associate with an ethnic grievance.
@JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon Trump never received a NAACP medal” for “helping America’s inner cities”.
@JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon The Ellis Island award is for success in your field. It's not a minority award. Hence, the reason Harvey Weinstein has one.

@Romello185 @CurtisScoon In 1986, Trump joined several other prominent Americans, such as Rosa Parks and Muhammad Ali, as recipients of an “Ellis Island Award.” plus some NAACP awards for working with black people and housing.
@JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon Jesse Jackson is not a standard. He can be discredited with a quick and swift google search. So that's not a check mark be paired w/him.
@JohnnyBishop @CurtisScoon Let's provide some honest analysis here. On what work/merit were those awards given out and who was doing the giving?!

@CurtisScoon I’m still waiting on Jesse and Al to come out and call him a racist. Haven’t seen it yet. Is it because they or their organizations are going to be needing that $ from Trump Central after he’s thru being POTUS?
@CurtisScoon The Time had a song called Black Donald Trump. Dude was getting  black achievement awards with Jessie Jackson. Amazing what a letter "R" behind your name with do, huh.

@CurtisScoon We looked up the other night how many times DT was mentioned in rap songs and it was like 317 mostly positive about being LIKE Trump.. in the past 2 years it’s 38 times almost all negative.. weird..

@CurtisScoon Plus, Trump and Russell Simmons were real tight homies. They spent every weekend together at the height of their friendship. Hell, Trump wrote the foreword to two of Russell's first two books. And was there when he romanced Melania. I guess molesters stick together.
@CurtisScoon Nothing changed.  They just control what’s shown of black people on social media to use them for their benefit.  If your black and not on their agenda, you won’t be as visible 🤷‍♂️

@CurtisScoon some Black ppl dont know that Trump used to own a lot of shares in Def Comedy Jam after Russell made it public. Rappers had lyrics about "how they wanted to be like Trump/or do business like Trump!"  Do these people need a strong dose of caffeine to reboot their memory? Lol

@CurtisScoon #Trump was Black to ninjas because WE can be gullible sheeple, a lot. #ChurchAnyone or how about #KanyeWest ? I swear WE Black people are SUPER gullible because #KanyeWest should not have 1 of our dollars, but he continues to ball as he gives it all to white people. #smh
@CurtisScoon Actors are so stupid.
@CurtisScoon where exactly is Alec Baldwin running into black people?  And walking around NYC doesn’t count.
@CurtisScoon According to Alex Baldwin. Lol. Like he has the capability to determine who qualifies as blackest. 🤔🤔🤔

@CurtisScoon I'm a Christian. not liberal, not conservative... but everytime i hear a white person say something like "i know what black people want" or "black people love me because INSERT HERE" my skin crawls. It's like listening to Kathy Griffin saying "Oh the GAYS LOVE me!!!"
@CurtisScoon @ctlansdown Let's be honest. President Obama was the only black man that 95% of actors, actresses & entertainers ever knew or would tolerate.
@ctlansdown @CurtisScoon He's attempting to imply that his comedy liberated them from their fear of Trump.
@CurtisScoon I'm often a bit out of the loop on these things: is there some way that "they love me because I played what they fear most" makes even a speck of sense?
